Get the Acyclica Configuration
Gets the connected vehicle configs.  There will only be one set of configs.

post.summary: Adds a new connected vehicle config.  There can only be one set of configs. If configs already exists this will throw an error.

requestBody.description: The connected vehicle config to add

500.description: Returns an error if configs already exist

put.summary: Updates the existing connected vehicle config

requestBody.description: The connected vehicle config to update

500.description: Returns an error if the config could not be updated

404.description: Returns nothing if the connected vehicle config were unable to be deleted

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
